messages.title: GIVE ME AND MY CANDIDATE YOUR VOTE ON THURSDAY 8TH JUNE AND I WILL:
messages.content: Provide a strong and stable leadership for our country to deliver the best Brexit deal possible for our future. Always stand up for you and your family. Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else.

messages.title: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A strong economy to create jobs and improving services to support people back into work.
Giving everyone the best start in life by fighting for the best schools and skills for young people.
Ensuring mental health care and treatment is given equal priority as physical health.

issues.brexitEurope: Provide a strong and stable leadership for our country to deliver the best Brexit deal possible for our future.
issues.economy: A strong economy to create jobs and improving services to support people back into work.
issues.education: Giving everyone the best start in life by fighting for the best schools and skills for young people.
issues.health: Ensuring mental health care and treatment is given equal priority as physical health.

endorsements.endorsement: GIVE ME AND MY CANDIDATE YOUR VOTE ON THURSDAY 8TH JUNE AND I WILL: Provide a strong and stable leadership for our country to deliver the best Brexit deal possible for our future. Always stand up for you and your family. Don't risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else.

quotes.text: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

images.caption: Dr Ben Spencer with a caption 'STANDING WITH THERESA MAY'
